title: Animated French Flag WatchFace
summary: Animated Flag of France for Wear (Analog + Digital)! Amazing waving flag effect.
description: First fully realistic animated Flag of France Watch Face with 3d Waving Flag effect. Experience dynamic, fluid and continuous Watch Face! Impress Your Friends and Family.Features :★ Beautiful animated watch face. Choose from analog and digital version.★ First fully animated flag effect for Android Wear.★ Continuous loop of realistic, waving flag.★ Tap to start / stop the animation.★ Tap to change date and day information.★ Mobile and wear app.★ Ambient mode background support.★ + 6 static backgrounds included.★ many more (amazing features) still to come...Animated Flag of France Watch Face. Show love for your Country wherever you are. Great Watch Face for all kinds of partys, travel, events, meetings and everywhere you go! Great for big events, like Euro 2016 ! Easy startup and lots of settings to choose from. Supported all Devices with Android Wear (round and squared):• Motorola Moto360• LG G WATCH R• LG G Watch• Samsung Gear LIVE• SmartWatch 3• ASUS ZenWatch (optimized for Low-Bit Ambient Mode)• Sony 3 Android Wear• LG Watch Urbane• Fossil Q Founder• Casio WSD F10Looking for other country's flag? Please check out our other apps. If you spot something wrong please feedback me. App will be updated frequently.
descriptionHTML:
First fully realistic animated Flag of France Watch Face with 3d Waving Flag effect. Experience dynamic, fluid and continuous Watch Face! Impress Your Friends and Family.

Features :
★ Beautiful animated watch face. Choose from analog and digital version.
★ First fully animated flag effect for Android Wear.
★ Continuous loop of realistic, waving flag.
★ Tap to start / stop the animation.
★ Tap to change date and day information.
★ Mobile and wear app.
★ Ambient mode background support.
★ + 6 static backgrounds included.
★ many more (amazing features) still to come...

Animated Flag of France Watch Face. Show love for your Country wherever you are. Great Watch Face for all kinds of partys, travel, events, meetings and everywhere you go! Great for big events, like Euro 2016 ! Easy startup and lots of settings to choose from.

Supported all Devices with Android Wear (round and squared):
• Motorola Moto360
• LG G WATCH R
• LG G Watch
• Samsung Gear LIVE
• SmartWatch 3
• ASUS ZenWatch (optimized for Low-Bit Ambient Mode)
• Sony 3 Android Wear
• LG Watch Urbane
• Fossil Q Founder
• Casio WSD F10

Looking for other country's flag? Please check out our other apps.

If you spot something wrong please feedback me. App will be updated frequently.
recentChanges: ★ You can now individually change colors to desired one of almost every element of the Watch Face:
Analog: change second, date and ticks
